metadata.title: USN-4295-1 -- Rake vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Rake incorrectly handled certain files. An attacker could use this issue to possibly execute arbitrary commands.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4295-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  rake - 12.3.1-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
